statements: DELETE FROM behavior_patterns WHERE target_name = 'John' AND behavior_type = 'Aggressive';
DELETE FROM behavior_patterns WHERE id = 1 AND target_name = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM behaviors WHERE behavior_type = 'Click' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM behaviors WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND behavior_type = 'purchase';
DELETE FROM preferences WHERE target_id = 5 AND preference_type = 'Email';
DELETE FROM behaviors WHERE behavior_type = 'Targeted' AND behavior_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_name = 'Holiday Campaign' AND start_date > '2022-06-01';
